title: EveMasy - Under Development
description: Event Management is a web-based application designed to streamline the process of organizing and managing events, users can Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD operation) events and view other users' publications events, and an administrator dashboard for managing users and events lists. Tech stack: MongoDB, Express, React, Node, Docker, AWS.

title: B2B Garments eCommerce
description: A web application to help our organization manage client/customer inquiries and serve better services and enhancement our garments manufacturing production by using their feedback.Features: Administrator Dashboard | Managing user's account | Create, edit, and remove product listing | Create a list of categories | Receive all inquiries and feedback on each product item list. Customer Dashboard | Customer can signup and login | Browse all product listings and request a quotation | Can send feedback. Tech stack: React, Node, Express, MySQL, CSS, BootStrap, ORM.

title: Chat Application
description: A chat web application in real-time communication. Features: user can signup and log in | and send messages to others. Tech stack: React, Node, MySQL, BootStrap, CSS.

title: ACMADE Scheduler
description: Build with a serverless web applications and NoSQL document database enable to use google provider authentication.
